=== Joining the Community ===

If you want to get involved with <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam|Mozilla Team]]</nowiki>, you can use the following resources:

==== Homepage ====

You can always access our homepage at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam

==== Mailing List ====

Join our mailing list at https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-mozillateam

You can read an archive of messages at https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-mozillateam/

==== IRC ====

Contact on the Freenode IRC network at <code>#ubuntu-mozillateam</code>.

If you have any question contact the team via the mailing list or IRC channel listed above.
